summary: 8 new colored sets of glass weapons and armor.
descriptionHtml:
-Description-
This mod adds 8 new sets of glass armor and weapons to the game.  Every set is a unique color.  The color options are: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Ice, Blue, Purple, and White.  Every set is fully craftable at a forge and upgradable at a grindstone.  You need to have the \"Glass Smithing\" perk in order to craft them.  They are essentially the same as the regular glass weapons and armor in the default game, only giving you the options on the colors to mix and match as you please.

-Installation-
Download with NMM or extract to your Skyrim\\Data directory (usually \"Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\")

-Compatibility-
No known incompatibilities. if you encounter any, please report them either to the comments section, or by messaging me. The new arrow crafting in 1.2 should be compatible with any other crafting mod, including ones that add arrow recipes.


CHANGELOG:

1.3- +New color set: \"White\". Includes all recipes as the other 7.
      +New resource textures for Black set *to be added in 1.4*
      *Fix for vanilla-appearing first person textures.
      *Minor color tweaks to orange set

1.2.1- *Fix for people who were having troubled installing it with NMM.

1.2- +New Recipes for ALL 7 colors of glass arrows.
      +New resource textures for white colored glass set.
      *Scabbards(sheathes) now colored more appropriately to match weapons.
      *Minor color tweaks to women\'s curiass
      *Minor color tweaks to ALL bows.
      *Yellow arrows now textured as yellow (oops)
      *Better res normal maps.
 
1.1- *Bug fix where Orange Greatsword displayed as Ice colored.

1.0- *Initial release.
author: Hay Hol
